sendPropertyProfile

Overview

This call is used to fetch the property profile report of a particular property; it uses the BSGv2.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
propertyId Property Id Yes
bedroom Number of Bedroom No
bathroom Number of Bathroom No
carspace Number of Carspace No
email Email Address Yes
firstname First Name No
surname Surname No

Sample Request { "op": "sendPropertyProfile", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "email": "dennis.salibio@tooltwist.com", "propertyId": "7007111", "firstname": "dennis", "surname": "salibio", "bedroom": "1", "bathroom": "1", "carspace": "1" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "response": "success", "doneTransaction": true } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
